visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has specific margins set to ensure proper spacing around the chart area. The x-axis represents the months of the year with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius, also with styled labels and a title. The data series includes the monthly average temperature data, with a custom color of blue (#0073e6). The legend is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a smaller font size. Additionally, the credits and navigation buttons are disabled to keep the chart clean and focused.
